qas.question: What genre of music did season ten American Idol contestant Lauren Alaina sing?
Who was the winner of American Idols tenth season?
What song did Scotty McCreery first release after winning American Idol?
What song did Lauren Alaina release after coming in second on American Idol?
What is the name of the successful album that Ruben Studdard released in 2003?
When was the season finale of Idol?
Scotty's first album reached the top Billboard spot, the first time for an Idol winner since when?

context: The two finalists in 2011 were Lauren Alaina and <a1_0>Scotty McCreery<a1_0/>, both teenage <a0_0>country<a0_0/> singers. McCreery won the competition on <a5_0>May 25<a5_0/>, being the youngest male winner and the fourth male in a row to win American Idol. McCreery released his first single, "<a2_0>I Love You This Big<a2_0/>", as his coronation song, and Alaina released "<a3_0>Like My Mother Does<a3_0/>". McCreery's debut album, Clear as Day, became the first debut album by an Idol winner to reach No. 1 on the US Billboard 200 since <a6_0>Ruben Studdard<a6_0/>'s <a4_0>Soulful<a4_0/> in 2003, and he became the youngest male artist to reach No. 1 on the Billboard 200.
